exerciseChatbot.title: Iris: Your AI-Powered Learning Assistant
exerciseChatbot.subtext: Iris is an intelligent virtual tutor powered by the EduTelligence suite. She enhances your learning journey by providing personalized assistance, answering questions, and supporting you through programming exercises and course content.
exerciseChatbot.text1_1: EduTelligence Integration: Iris is powered by Pyris, which is part of the EduTelligence suite - a comprehensive collection of AI-powered microservices designed to enhance educational technology platforms.
exerciseChatbot.text1_2: Data Processing & Privacy: Your interactions with Iris may be processed within external European data centers, such as the Microsoft Azure Cloud. Please check with your institution's privacy policy and ensure you agree to the data processing before using Iris.
exerciseChatbot.text2_1: Programming Assistance: Iris can help with programming questions, including syntax, algorithms, data structures, debugging, and code improvement suggestions.
exerciseChatbot.text2_2: Contextual Understanding: Unlike generic chatbots, Iris has access to your exercise context, including problem statements, your code submissions, build results, and course materials.
exerciseChatbot.text2_3: Educational Guidance: Iris is designed to guide your learning rather than provide direct solutions. She offers hints, explanations, and step-by-step assistance to help you understand concepts.
exerciseChatbot.text2_4: Multi-Exercise Support: Iris can assist with various exercise types including programming, modeling, and text exercises, adapting her responses to the specific context.
exerciseChatbot.text2_5: Continuous Learning: Your feedback helps improve Iris's performance. Rate responses and conversations to contribute to the system's enhancement.
exerciseChatbot.text3_1: Learning-Focused: Iris won't provide complete solutions but will guide you through the problem-solving process to enhance your understanding.
exerciseChatbot.text3_2: Academic Scope: Iris focuses on course-related content and programming topics. She won't engage in off-topic conversations or provide organizational information.
exerciseChatbot.text3_3: Responsible Use: Use Iris as a learning aid while maintaining academic integrity. Always ensure your final submissions represent your own understanding and work.
exerciseChatbot.text4_1: Flexible Positioning: Click and drag the chat widget to move it around your screen for optimal positioning while working on exercises.
exerciseChatbot.text4_2: Resizable Window: Adjust the widget size by dragging its borders to fit your workspace and preferences.
exerciseChatbot.text4_3: Full Screen Mode: Expand the widget to full screen for more detailed conversations and better readability.
exerciseChatbot.text4_4: Session Management: Clear your chat history anytime using the trash can button to start fresh conversations.
exerciseChatbot.text4_5: Persistent History: Your conversation history is maintained across sessions, allowing you to continue previous discussions.
exerciseChatbot.supportText: (For technical issues or feedback about Iris, please contact your course instructors or create an issue on GitHub: https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis.)
